title: The first part of Ieronimo With the warres of Portugall, and the life and death of Don Andræa.
author: Kyd, Thomas, 1558-1594. Spanish tragedy.
publisher: [By William Jaggard] for Thomas Pauyer, and are to be solde at his shop, at the entrance into the Exchange,
notes: Although this play purports to be a precursor to "The Spanish tragedie", Thomas Kyd is probably not the author.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
